thread.title: Ghana striker Jordan Ayew makes second-half appearance in Aston Villa defeat
thread.title_full: Ghana striker Jordan Ayew makes second-half appearance in Aston Villa defeat

title: Ghana striker Jordan Ayew makes second-half appearance in Aston Villa defeat
text:
19:40 CET Ghana striker Jordan Ayew makes second-half appearance in Aston Villa defeat - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Jordan Ayew was a second-half substitute as his Aston Villa side suffered 1-0 home defeat to Stoke City in the English Premier League on Saturday. 
The Ghana striker came on as a substitute in the 59th minute as his side dropped into the relegation zone. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
